contents.text: Welcome to RaiseMe, your San Francisco-based marketplace for earning college micro-scholarships beginning in ninth grade.
To inquire about signing up as a student, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you to a student success advisor.

navigationGoals: Help me enroll as a student so I can start earning micro-scholarships.
I’m a veteran parent and need to sign my high schooler up for RaiseMe scholarships.
I want to onboard as a student user, set up my account, and confirm eligibility requirements with an advisor.
I need help signing up as a student on RaiseMe.
I want to sign up as a student to start earning micro-scholarships.

contents.text: To learn how to track your scholarship progress, press 2.
Please hold while we connect you to our scholarship tracking support team.

navigationGoals: I need guidance on monitoring my scholarship earnings progress.
I’m a veteran and want to check how to track my child’s micro-scholarship progress.
I need assistance configuring my dashboard analytics to monitor my micro-scholarship accruals in real time.
I want assistance tracking my scholarship progress.
I need help understanding and tracking my existing scholarship progress.

contents.text: If you are a college interested in partnering with RaiseMe, press 2.
To speak with our partnerships development team, press 1.
One moment please, connecting you to our partnerships development team.

navigationGoals: I represent a college and want to discuss partnership opportunities.
I work in a college’s veterans affairs office and want to discuss partnering with RaiseMe.
I’m representing a university and want to discuss partnership opportunities and integration roadmap with your development team.
I’m calling to learn how my college can partner with RaiseMe.
I’d like to explore a partnership between my physics department and RaiseMe.

contents.text: One moment please, connecting you to our technical integration specialists.

navigationGoals: I need assistance integrating RaiseMe with our institution’s systems.
I’m a former service member now in our college IT team and need help integrating RaiseMe into our system.
I need to coordinate API integration specs for our student information system, including sandbox access and endpoint documentation.
I need technical integration support for RaiseMe at my college.
I need technical guidance to integrate RaiseMe features into our department’s system.
